string-array.name: switch_apps_entries
string-array.item: An yi amfani dashi a Sararin aiki na farko
An yi amfani a cikin wannan sararin aikin
An yi amfani dashi a dukan sararin ayyuka guda biyun

string-array.name: switch_apps_msg_confirms
string-array.item: "Za'a rasa bayanan manhajar bayan an canza wurin manhaja zuwa Sararin aiki na farko."
"Za'a rasa bayanan manhajar bayan an canza wurin manhaja zuwa wannan sararin aiki."
Ana amfani da manhaja a dukan sararin ayyuka guda biyun.
